page.title: 17BAPCHILD SCHOOL
page.content: Bapchild School is a Group 4 school that mainly draws its pupils from the villages of Bapchild and Tonge. A few children travel daily from more distant areas. The school is a Church Aided school with a strong association with the Church of St. Laurence, the Church of England church in Bapchild. The age range of the pupils at the school is from 5 years to 11 years. There are six classes and at present there are 178 children. The school, headed by Mr. D. Bowman, has a staff of six full-time teachers. The curriculum is wide ranging and incorp- orates visits to many venues. The school hall is used for many events, both by the school and outside organisations. The school was recently extended to accommodate the rise in the number of children on roll.
